persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a seasoned 43-year-old full-time crypto trader, embodies a blend of independence and rationality, driving his strategic approach to the volatile world of cryptocurrency. Known for his frugal nature, Ellis meticulously analyzes market trends, relying on data-driven insights to make informed investment decisions, ensuring a steady growth of his portfolio while minimizing unnecessary risks. His disciplined and methodical trading style has earned him a reputation as a respected figure in the crypto community.
